title: Apple of my 'IMAX': A movie theater in your home
text: Log in to comment on videos and join in on the fun. Watch the live stream of Fox News and full episodes. Reduce eye strain and focus on the content that matters. IMAX CEO Rich Gelfond exclusively details the 'spectacular' partnership between the entertainment company and Apple's new groundbreaking headset. ©2024 FOX News Network, LLC. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. All market data delayed 20 minutes.
